snippet: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority detailed plans for a pilot program aimed at sterilization, using a product that would be placed in bait boxes inside the authority’s trash rooms.
abstract: Metropolitan Transportation Authority details plans for a pilot program intended to curb fertility of female rats that are proliferating in subway system; proposes to test ContraPest, a product administered to rats orally, that accelerates natural egg loss and sterilizes female rats permanently.
lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority detailed plans for a pilot program aimed at sterilization, using a product that would be placed in bait boxes inside the authority’s trash rooms.

headline.seo: As Rats Escape Death, M.T.A. Turns to Sterilization
headline.main: As Rats Persist, Transit Agency Hopes to Curb Their Births
headline.print_headline: As Rats Persist, Transit Agency Hopes to Curb Their Births
